sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-card>
    <v-card-title> Create your Post </v-card-title>
    <v-card-text>
      <v-text-field v-model="title" label="title"></v-text-field>
      <v-textarea filled v-model="content"></v-textarea>
    </v-card-text>
    <v-card-actions>
      <v-btn @click="submit">Submit</v-btn>
    </v-card-actions>
  </v-card>
</template>

<script>
import PostService from "@/services/PostService";

export default {
  data() {
    return {
      title: "",
      content: "",
    };
  },
  methods: {
    //REFERING TO SERVICES/POSTSERVICE.JS THE SUBMIT FUNCTION SENDS A POST REQUEST TO THE WORDPRESS REST API, TAKING THE INPUT OF THE CREATE YOUR POST FORM
    //TO GENERATE A TITLE AND DESCRIPTION.
    async submit() {
      let res = await PostService.createPost({
        title: this.title,
        content: this.content,
        status: "publish",
      });
      console.log(res);
    },
  },
};
</script>
